page.title: 07ONE BOY'S DAY
page.content:
{ {CALDECOTE,SMALL VILLAGE,CAMBRIDGESHIRE A DAY IN THE LIFE OF BEN PULLEN,AGE 11
I WAKE UP IN THE MORNING AT ABOUT 7AM. AND JUST LIE THERE FOR ABOUT HALF AN HOUR.THEN I GET OUT OF BED AND GET MY OWN BREAKFAST OF CEREAL,BREAD OR TOAST AND TEA.THEN I GET WASHED AND DRESSED READY FOR SCHOOL.THEN I GET A VIDEO TAPE AND WATCH IT ON TV THEN IT'S "GOODBYE" TOO MUM,TURN OFF THE TV,THEN GO OFF TO SCHOOL. AT SCHOOL WE DO ENGLISH,THEN HAVE PLAYTIME,THEN ITS MATHS UP TO LUNCHTIME.AFTER DINNER WE HAVE A PLAYTIME,THEN STUDY ALL SORTS OF THINGS TILL HOME TIME.SCHOOL IS 9.00AM UNTIL 3.15 PM. AT HOME I CHANGE AND GO OUT TO PLAY.THEN I HAVE TEA,WATCH TV,THEN GO TO BED AT ABOUT 8.30PM.
